La réduction dure jusqu'à ce que la cible termine un long repos. La cible meurt si cet effet réduit son maximum de points de vie à 0.

action.name: Summon Undead (1/Day)
entries: Le vampire conjure {@filter undead creatures no higher than CR 5|bestiary|type=undead|challenge rating=[&0;&5]} et dont les points de vie moyens combinés ne dépassent pas 150. Ces morts-vivants sortent magiquement du sol ou se forment dans des espaces inoccupés situés à moins de 60 pieds du vampire et obéissent à ses ordres jusqu'à ce qu'ils soient détruits, jusqu'à ce qu'il les renvoie par une action, ou jusqu'à ce que 8 heures se soient écoulées.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Le vampire lance l'un des sorts suivants en utilisant la Sagesse comme capacité de lanceur de sorts (sauvegarde contre les sorts {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} pour toucher avec les attaques de sorts) :

reaction.name: Mantle of Majesty (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Le vampire lance Commandement, sans dépenser d'emplacement de sort. Pendant 1 minute ou jusqu'à la fin de sa concentration (comme s'il se concentrait sur un sort), il peut lancer Commandement comme action bonus à chacun de ses tours, sans dépenser d'emplacement de sort. Toute créature charmée par lui rate automatiquement son jet de sauvegarde contre le commandement qu'il lance avec cette caractéristique.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Le vampire lance l'un des sorts suivants en utilisant le Charisme comme capacité de lanceur de sorts (sauvegarde contre les sorts {@dc 15}) :

monster.name: Vampire Spawn Commander
languages: The languages it knew in life

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Le vampire regagne 10 points de vie au début de son tour s'il a au moins 1 point de vie et s'il n'est pas au soleil ou dans l'eau courante. Si le vampire subit des dégâts radiants ou des dégâts d'eau bénite, ce trait ne fonctionne pas au début du prochain tour du vampire.

entries: Le vampire peut grimper sur des surfaces difficiles, y compris à l'envers sur des plafonds, sans avoir besoin de faire un test d'aptitude.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Le vampire utilise la fonction Manœuvrer les alliés, si elle est disponible. Il effectue ensuite trois attaques, dont une seule peut être une attaque de morsure.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une cible. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) dégâts tranchants.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une créature. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) dégâts tranchants. Au lieu d'infliger des dégâts, le vampire peut agripper la cible (échapper à {@dc 14}).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} pour toucher, portée de 5 ft, une créature consentante, ou une créature qui est {@condition grappled} par le vampire, frappée d'incapacité, ou {@condition restrained}. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) dégâts perforants plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) dégâts nécrotiques. Le maximum de points de vie de la cible est réduit d'un montant égal aux dégâts nécrotiques subis, et le vampire regagne un nombre de points de vie égal à ce montant. La réduction dure jusqu'à ce que la cible termine un long repos. La cible meurt si cet effet réduit son maximum de points de vie à 0.

action.name: Maneuver Allies {@recharge 5}
entries: Jusqu'à quatre alliés situés à 60 pieds du vampire et pouvant l'entendre peuvent chacun utiliser leur réaction pour se déplacer jusqu'à la moitié de leur vitesse sans provoquer {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

bonus.name: Battle Command
entries: Le vampire cible un allié qu'il peut voir dans un rayon de 30 pieds autour de lui. Si la cible peut voir ou entendre le vampire, elle peut utiliser sa réaction pour effectuer une attaque de mêlée ou pour effectuer l'action {@action Dodge} ou {@action Hide}.

reaction.name: Directed Strike (3/Day)
entries: Lorsqu'une créature que le vampire peut voir dans un rayon de 30 pieds fait un jet d'attaque, et que la créature peut entendre le vampire, ce dernier accorde l'avantage à ce jet.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: L'ursinal a un avantage sur les jets de sauvegarde contre les sorts et autres effets magiques.

trait.name: Speak With Beasts
entries: The ursinal can communicate with beasts as if they shared a language.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the ursinal casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ursinal makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage and if the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ursinal casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Dark One's Own Luck (Recharges After A Short Or Long Rest)
entries: rWhen the kobold makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a d10 to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll's effects occur.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kobold casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Kuraulyek's Tongue
entries: The kobold can communicate with ordinary bats and giant bats.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kobold makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage and if the target is a creature, it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage and the kobold regains hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Command Bat
entries: The kobold targets one allied beast (bat types only) it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the kobold, the target can use its reaction to move up to half their speed and make one melee attack.

bonus.name: Summon Bat (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The kobold summons {@dice 3d6} bats, 1 giant bat, or 1 swarm of bats. The bats appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the kobold and acts as its allies. The bats act right after the kobold on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They remain for 1 hour, until they or the kobold dies, or until the kobold dismisses them as an action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kobold casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:

legendary.name: Charge
entries: The kobold moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Javelin
entries: The kobold makes a Javelin attack.

legendary.name: Dagger (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kobold makes a Dagger attack.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the fallen archon's {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Improved Critical
entries: The fallen archon's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

trait.name: Corrupting Gaze
entries: Provided the fallen archon isn't {@condition incapacitated}, if a non-evil creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the fallen archon and the two of them can see each other, the fallen archon can force the creature to make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the fallen archon until the start of its next turn. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature suffers the effect of the dominate monster spell without making a saving throw and treats all enemies of the fallen archon as its enemies. The fallen archon doesn't need to concentrate on the spell.

A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the fallen archon until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.

If it looks at the fallen archon in the meantime, it must immediately make the save. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the fallen archon's Corrupting Gaze for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The fallen archon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fallen archon makes three Greatsword attacks, or makes one Greatsword attack and casts one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The fallen archon magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has grappled, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The tyrant archon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Multi-headed
entries: The dragon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked {@condition unconscious}. For each head the dragon has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}..

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes two Bite attacks and two Claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une cible. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) dégâts tranchants.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 4}
entries: The dragon exhales acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 49 ({@damage 11d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Multi-headed
entries: The dragon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}. For each head the dragon has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes two Claw attacks and one Tail attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +15 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 4}
entries: The dragon exhales acid in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw, taking 67 ({@damage 15d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Acid Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon uses Acid Breath, if available.

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon makes a Bite attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 2d6 +8}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Multi-headed
entries: The dragon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}. For each head the dragon has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes two Claw attacks and one Tail attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +11 pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une cible. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) dégâts tranchants.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Chaque créature du choix du dragon qui se trouve dans un rayon de 120 pieds autour du dragon et qui est consciente de celui-ci doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde de Sagesse {@dc 16} ou devenir {@condition frightened} pendant 1 minute. Une créature peut répéter le jet de sauvegarde à la fin de chacun de ses tours, mettant fin à l'effet sur elle-même en cas de réussite. Si le jet de sauvegarde d'une créature est réussi ou si l'effet prend fin pour elle, la créature est immunisée contre la présence effrayante du dragon pendant les 24 heures suivantes.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 4}
entries: The dragon exhales acid in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Acid Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon uses Acid Breath, if available.

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon makes a Bite attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Aura of Menace
entries: The archon emanates an aura of menace in a 30-foot radius. The first time any enemy creature enters the aura or starts its turn there during a battle, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the archon for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: L'archonte a un avantage sur les jets de sauvegarde contre les sorts et autres effets magiques.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The archon makes three Buisine attacks.

action.name: Buisine
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The archon magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has grappled, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Herald's Call {@recharge 5}
entries: The archon plays its buisine to create a sound of utter clarity and piercing beauty. Each non-celestial creature within 120 feet that can hear the archon must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition charmed} for 1 minute. A creature charmed in this way is {@condition paralyzed}. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the archon's Herald's Call for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Buisine Blast (1/Day)
entries: The archon blows its buisine to emit a thunderous blast in a 60-foot cone that is audible 600 feet away. Each creature in the cone must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 54 ({@damage 12d8}) thunder damage and is {@condition deafened} for 1 minute. If a target's saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is also {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition deafened}. Creatures and objects made of glass or crystal have disadvantage on the saving throw and take 108 ({@damage 24d8}) thunder damage instead of 54 ({@damage 12d8}).

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The trumpet archon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the revenant remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Le revenant regagne 10 points de vie au début de son tour. Si le revenant subit des dégâts de feu ou de rayonnement, ce trait ne fonctionne pas au début du prochain tour du revenant. Le corps du revenant est détruit uniquement s'il commence son tour avec 0 point de vie et ne se régénère pas.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: When the revenant's body is destroyed, its soul lingers. After 24 hours, the soul inhabits and animates another treant corpse on the same plane of existence and regains all its hit points. While the soul is bodiless, a wish spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The revenant deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: Le revenant est immunisé contre les effets qui transforment les morts-vivants.

trait.name: Vengeful Strikes
entries: Si la cible touchée par l'attaque de mêlée du revenant est une créature contre laquelle le revenant a juré vengeance, elle subit 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dégâts d'arme supplémentaires.

trait.name: Vengeful Tracker
entries: Le revenant connaît la distance et la direction de toute créature contre laquelle il cherche à se venger, même si la créature et le revenant se trouvent sur des plans d'existence différents. Si la créature poursuivie par le revenant meurt, le revenant le sait.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The revenant makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} +11 to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Animate Trees (1/Day)
entries: The revenant magically animates one or two trees it can see within 60 feet of it. These trees have the same statistics as a treant, except they have Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, they can't speak, and they have only the Slam action option. An animated tree acts as an ally of the revenant. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies; until the revenant dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree; or until the revenant takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.

action.name: Vengeful Glare
entries: The revenant targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it and against which it has sworn vengeance. The target must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is {@condition paralyzed} until the revenant deals damage to it, or until the end of the revenant's next turn. When the paralysis ends, the target is {@condition frightened} of the revenant for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if it can see the revenant, ending the {@condition frightened} condition on itself on a success.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: At night, the tiktik can use its action to polymorph into its Fiend Form or back into its true form, which is humanoid. In Fiend Form, the tiktik appears as a hybrid humanoid vampire bat. Its statistics, other than its Speed, damage, and damage resistances, are the same in each form. It reverts to its true form at dawn or if it dies. While transformed, the tiktik also gains the following features.

items: The tiktik's creature type changes to fiend.
The tiktik has advantage on Strength and Dexterity checks and Strength and Dexterity saving throws.
When it makes a melee weapon attack, the tiktik gains a {@hit 3} bonus to the damage roll (included in the attack).
The tiktik can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
If the tiktik starts its turn within 10 feet of a pound of salt or garlic, it becomes {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Keen Hearing And Smell
entries: The tiktik has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tiktik makes two attacks. two with its Dagger (humanoid form) or one with its Tongue and one with its Talons (fiend form).

action.name: Tongue (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage, and the tiktik's tongue attaches to the target. While attached, the tiktik can't attack with its tongue. Instead, at the start of each of the tiktik's turns, the target loses 7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) hit points and the tiktik gains temporary hit points equal to the amount of hit points lost by the target.
If the target is {@condition unconscious} and takes damage or loses hit points, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or fail to notice the attack.

The tiktik can detach its tongue by using a bonus action. It does so after it drains 15 hit points of blood from the target or the target dies. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the tiktik's tongue.

action.name: Talons (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger (Humanoid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The tikbalang has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The sarimanok has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The tikbalang can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tikbalang makes three attacks: one Bite attack or Kick attack and two Claw attacks, or three Mane Spine attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw against disease or become {@condition poisoned} until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the creature must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 ({@damage 1d10}) on a failure. This reduction lasts until the disease is cured. The creature dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Mane Spine
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage and the target is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute or until one spends an action to remove the spine.

action.name: Illusory Appearance
entries: The tikbalang covers itself and anything it is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes it look like another creature of Large size or smaller. The illusion ends if the tikbalang takes a bonus action to end it or if it dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the tikbalang could appear to have a regular humanoid face, but someone touching its face would feel its equine-shaped snout. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a {@dc 20} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check to discern that the tikbalang is disguised.

reaction.name: Rear Kick
entries: When a creature the tikbalang can see moves within 5 feet of it, the tikbalang can make one Kick attack against the creature.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The tikbalang casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

trait.name: Blind Senses
entries: The tigbanua can't use its {@sense blindsight} while {@condition deafened} and unable to smell.

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: Any creature hostile to the tigbanua that starts its turn within 10 feet of the tigbanua must make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw, unless the tigbanua is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the tigbanua's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Keen Hearing And Smell
entries: The tigbanua has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The tigbanua has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the tigbanua's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tigbanua makes two attacks: one with its Bite and one with its Claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage and if the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or become afflicted by the {@creature buso|MonsterManualExpanded3} aswang curse. Casting {@spell remove curse}, {@spell greater restoration}, or a similar spell on the target before the transformation is complete can end the curse. Doing so undoes the changes made to the target by the curse.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the thug gang boss a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The thug gang boss has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the thug gang boss's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thug gang boss uses Maneuver Allies, if available. It then makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Great Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Maneuver Allies {@recharge 5}
entries: Up to four allies within 60 feet of this thug gang boss that can hear it can each use their reaction to move up to half their speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

bonus.name: Battle Command
entries: The thug gang boss one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the thug gang boss, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack or to take the {@action Dodge} or {@action Hide} action.

reaction.name: Redirect Attack
entries: When a creature the thug gang boss can see targets it with an attack, the thug gang boss chooses an ally within 5 feet of it. The thug gang boss swaps places with the chosen ally, and the chosen ally becomes the target instead.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The thug gang boss moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Cheap Shot
entries: Melee Weapon {@action Attack}: {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The thug gang boss makes a melee or ranged weapon attack.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The thug captain has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the thug captain's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thug captain uses Maneuver Allies, if available. It then makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Maneuver Allies {@recharge 5}
entries: Up to three allies within 60 feet of this thug captain that can hear it can each use their reaction to move up to half their speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

bonus.name: Battle Command
entries: The thug captain targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the thug captain, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack or to take the {@action Dodge} or {@action Hide} action.

trait.name: Aura of Menace
entries: The archon emanates an aura of menace in a 30-foot radius. The first time any enemy creature enters the aura or starts its turn there during a battle, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the archon for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

trait.name: Improved Critical
entries: The archon's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

trait.name: Penitentiary Gaze
entries: Provided the archon isn't {@condition incapacitated}, if a non-lawful good creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the archon and the two of them can see each other, the archon can force the creature to make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw if the archon isn't {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature becomes wracked with guilt and filled with remorse over its life's actions that weren't lawful or good, and suffers an effect depending on its alignment.

LN or NG. The target suffers the effect of the {@spell confusion} spell without making a saving throw. The effect lasts until the end of its next turn. The archon doesn't need to concentrate on the spell.
CG, CN or N. Gain 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}.
CE, NE, or LE. Gain 1 level of {@condition exhaustion} and take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) psychic damage and 5 ({@damage 1d10}) radiant damage.

A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the archon until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.

If it looks at the archon in the meantime, it must immediately make the save. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the archon's Penitentiary Gaze for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: L'archonte a un avantage sur les jets de sauvegarde contre les sorts et autres effets magiques.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: he archon makes three Greatsword attacks, or makes one Greatsword attack and casts one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

action.name: Greatsword

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The sphinx's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sphinx makes two Claw attacks. If both Claw attacks hit the same target, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Suppress Magic {@recharge 5}
entries: The sphinx targets one magic item it can see within 120 feet of it. If the magic item isn't an artifact, its magical properties are suppressed for 10 minutes, until the sphinx is {@condition incapacitated} or dies, or until the sphinx uses a bonus action to end the effect.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
