bonus.name: Ever-Open Eyes (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The bugbear gains {@sense blindsight} 60 ft. for 1 minute.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: The bugbear halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it. The bugbear must be able to see the attacker.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The bugbear casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks):

legendary.name: Darkness
entries: The bugbear casts {@spell darkness}, if available.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The bugbear moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Glaring Eye of Grankhul
entries: The bugbear turns its gaze toward one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition paralyzed} until the end of the bugbear's next turn.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The bugbear makes a melee or ranged attack.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the bugbear fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the bugbear casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Sickle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or the target's speed is halved. In addition, the creature can't take reactions, and it can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. The effects last until the end of the bugbear's next turn.

bonus.name: Cloak of Skiggaret (3/Day)
entries: The bugbear can radiate an aura of terrifying darkness, appearing swathed in shadowy tendrils. A creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the bugbear, or touches it or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of the bugbear and the Cloak of Skiggaret is active takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage and must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. The Cloak of Skiggaret remains for 1 minute, until the bugbear dies, or until the bugbear dismisses it as an action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The bugbear casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks):

legendary.name: Move
entries: The bugbear moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Sickle
entries: The bugbear attacks with its Sickle.

legendary.name: Claws of Skiggaret (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Ranged Spell {@action Attack}: {@hit 6} to hit, range 30 ft., one or two targets. Hit: 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it deals only half damage with weapon attacks that use Strength for 1 minute. The target can make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effects on itself on a success.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the bugbear fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bugbear makes two Morningstar attacks or two Longbow attacks.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Battle Command
entries: The bugbear targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the bugbear, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack or to take the {@action Dodge} or {@action Hide} action.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The bugbear moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Intimidate Foe
entries: The bugbear targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the bugbear, it must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the bugbear until the end of the bugbear's next turn.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The bugbear makes a melee or ranged attack.

legendary.name: Overhead Smash (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The bugbear attacks with its maul. If the attack hits, the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be knocked {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute. The {@condition unconscious} target repeats the saving throw if it takes damage and at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Brave
entries: The bugbear has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the bugbear can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bugbear makes two Greataxe attacks or two Longbow attacks.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d12 + 3}) slashing damage, or 18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) slashing damage while raging.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Rage (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The bugbear enters a rage. The rage lasts for 1 minute or until the bugbear is {@condition incapacitated}. While raging, the bugbear gains the following benefits:

items: The bugbear has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.
When it makes a melee weapon attack, the bugbear gains a {@hit 2} bonus to the damage roll (included in the attack.
The bugbear has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the bugbear fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bugbear uses Maneuver Allies, if available. It then makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Shield Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a creature it must make a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Maneuver Allies {@recharge 5}
entries: Up to three beast allies within 60 feet of this bugbear that can hear it each use their reaction to move up to half their speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

action.name: Summon Beast (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The bugbear summons {@dice 2d4} {@creature giant rat|MM|giant rats}, {@dice 1d4+1} {@creature wolf|MM|wolves}, {@dice 1d2} {@creature worg|MM|worgs}, or 1 {@creature dire wolf}. The beasts appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the bugbear and acts as its allies. The beasts act right after the bugbear on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They remain for 1 hour, until they or the bugbear dies, or until the bugbear dismisses them as an action.

reaction.name: Protective Beast
entries: When the bugbear is hit by an attack, one allied beast within 5 feet of the bugbear must use its reaction to be hit by the attack instead.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The bugbear casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as its spellcasting ability:

legendary.name: Move
entries: The bugbear moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Shield Slam
entries: The bugbear makes a shield slam attack.

legendary.name: Command Beast
entries: The bugbear targets one allied beast it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the bugbear, the target can use its reaction to make one weapon attack or move up to its speed.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The bugbear attacks with its battleaxe or longbow.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: Le dragon peut retenir son souffle pendant 15 minutes ou jusqu'à ce qu'il utilise son souffle acide.

trait.name: Sand Camouflage
entries: Le dragon a un avantage sur les tests de Dextérité ({@skill Stealth}) effectués pour se cacher en terrain sablonneux.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales corrosive sand in a 15-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) acid damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded}.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it dies, the naga returns to life in {@dice 1d6} days and regains all its hit points. Only a {@spell wish} spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage., and the target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Shining Scales {@recharge 5}
entries: The naga's golden scales emit a dazzling flash of light. Each creature within 30 feet of the naga and can see the naga must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The naga casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bladesinger makes two Shortsword attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Bladesong (3/Day)
entries: The bladesinger starts Bladesong, which lasts for 1 minute. It ends early if the bladesinger is {@condition incapacitated}, dons medium or heavy armor or a shield, or if it uses two hands to make an attack with a weapon. It can also dismiss the Bladesong at any time (no action required). While the Bladesong is active, the bladesinger gains the following benefits:

items: +3 bonus to its AC
walking speed increases by 10 feet
advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) checks
+3 bonus to any Constitution saving throw it makes to maintain concentration on a spell

reaction.name: Song of Defense
entries: When the bladesinger takes damage, it can expend one spell slot and reduce that damage by an amount equal to five times the spell slot's level.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The bladesinger casts one of the following spells using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks):
footerEntries: {@i *The bladesinger casts this spell on itself before combat.}

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the blackguard fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The blackguard's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The blackguard makes three attacks with its Longsword or its Shortbow.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage, or 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Dreadful Aspect (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The blackguard exudes magical menace. Each enemy within 30 feet of the blackguard must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. If a {@condition frightened} target ends its turn more than 30 feet away from the blackguard, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Summon Fiend (1/Day)
entries: The blackguard summons a barbed devil, barlgura, or mezzoloth. A summoned fiend appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the blackguard and acts as an ally of the blackguard. It remains for an hour, until it or the blackguard dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The blackguard casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks):

legendary.name: Charge
entries: The blackguard moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The blackguard makes a melee or ranged weapon attack.

legendary.name: Command Fiend
entries: The blackguard targets an allied fiend it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the blackguard, the target can use its reaction to make one melee weapon attack or move up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The blackguard uses Spellcasting.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The hag has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Loathsome Presence
entries: Any humanoid that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hag and can smell the hag must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature spends its action that turn retching and reeling. Humanoids that don't need to breathe or are immune to poison automatically succeed on this saving throw. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the hag's Loathsome Presence for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Aswang Curse (1/Day)
entries: A hag can curse an {@condition incapacitated} humanoid. The hag has to be within 5 feet of the humanoid for at least 5 minutes, after which it expels a shadowy essence from its mouth and transfers it into the target's, afflicting it with the {@creature buso|MonsterManualExpanded3} aswang curse. The {@creature buso|MonsterManualExpanded3} acts as the hag's ally. Casting {@spell remove curse}, {@spell greater restoration}, or a similar spell on the target can end the curse. Doing so undoes the changes made to the target by the curse.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hag makes two attacks. one with its Claws and one with its Tongue.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a successful save.

action.name: Haunting Wail {@recharge 6}
entries: The hag emits a terrifying wail that frightens foes and incites its undead allies into a frenzy. Each undead ally that is within 60 feet of the hag, can hear the hag, and not already affected by Haunting Wail gain advantage on attack rolls and saving throw rolls until the start of the hag's next turn. All other non-undead and non-fiend creatures within 60 feet of the hag must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. While {@condition frightened} in this way, a creature must take the {@action Dash} action and move away from the hag by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move, in which case it needn't take the {@action Dash} action. If the creature ends its turn in a location where it doesn't have line of sight to the hag, the creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the hag's Haunting Wail for the next 24 hours.

entries: The barbarian moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Intimidating Presence
entries: The barbarian targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the barbarian, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the barbarian for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to barbarian's Intimidating Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The barbarian makes a melee or ranged attack.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the bandit lord fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bandit lord uses Command Flanking Maneuver, if available. It then makes three melee attacks: two with its Scimitar and one with its Dagger. Or the bandit lord makes two ranged attacks with its Dagger.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Command Flanking Maneuver {@recharge 5}
entries: The bandit lord targets up to three allies it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the bandit lord, the target can use its reaction to move up to half its speed. The target's next attack has advantage until the start of the bandit lord's next turn.

bonus.name: Battle Command
entries: The bandit lord targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the bandit lord, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack or to take the {@action Dodge} or {@action Hide} action.

reaction.name: Parry and Counter
entries: The bandit lord adds 3 to its AC against one melee or ranged weapon attack that would hit it. To do so, it must be able to see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon. If the attack misses, the bandit lord can make one melee attack against the attacker if it is within its reach.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The bandit lord moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The bandit lord makes a melee or ranged weapon attack.

legendary.name: Cheap Shot
entries: Melee Weapon {@action Attack}: {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The avoral doesn't provoke {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks} when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The avoral has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The avoral has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Speak With Beasts
entries: The avoral can communicate with beasts as if they shared a language.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The avoral makes two melee weapon attacks. While flying, it can only make Talon attacks.

action.name: Talon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The avoral casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}):

trait.name: Enchanting Presence
entries: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the eladrin must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes {@condition charmed} by the eladrin for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin's Enchanting Presence for 24 hours.
Whenever the eladrin deals damage to the {@condition charmed} creature, the creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: L'eladrin a un avantage sur les jets de sauvegarde contre les sorts et autres effets magiques.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) slashing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage.

bonus.name: Fey Step {@recharge 4}
entries: L'eladrin se téléporte jusqu'à 30 pieds dans un espace inoccupé qu'il peut voir.

reaction.name: Foster Peace
entries: If a creature charmed by the eladrin hits with an attack roll while within 60 feet of the eladrin, the eladrin magically causes the attack to miss, provided the eladrin can see the attacker.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The eladrin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

monster.name: Autumn Eladrin, Elder

trait.name: Beguiling Strike
entries: When the eladrin hits a creature with a weapon attack, it can choose to deal no damage. The creature has disadvantage to its saving throws against being charmed and enchantment spells until the end of the eladrin's next turn.

trait.name: Enchanting Presence
entries: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes {@condition charmed} by the eladrin for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin's Enchanting Presence for 24 hours.
Whenever the eladrin deals damage to the {@condition charmed} creature, the creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: L'eladrin a un avantage sur les jets de sauvegarde contre les sorts et autres effets magiques.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: Lorsque l'eladrin lance un sort et qu'il est interrompu par le {@spell counterspell} d'un ennemi, traitez le niveau du sort comme étant supérieur de 3 niveaux.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: L'eladrin effectue deux attaques d'armes. L'eladrin peut lancer un sort à la place d'une de ces attaques.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) slashing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 27 ({@damage 6d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 27 ({@damage 6d8}) psychic damage.

reaction.name: Foster Peace
entries: If a creature charmed by the eladrin hits with an attack roll while within 60 feet of the eladrin, the eladrin magically causes the attack to miss, provided the eladrin can see the attacker.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The eladrin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}):

legendaryHeader: The eladrin gains 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The eladrin regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Move
entries: L'eladrin se déplace jusqu'à la moitié de sa vitesse sans provoquer {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Pacify
entries: The eladrin casts calm emotions or sleep.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The eladrin makes a weapon attack.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The aurumovrax has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the aurumvorax moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Claws attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aurumvorax makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks. If the aurumvorax has a creature grappled, it can use Rend Armor in place of one Claws attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage and if the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the aurumvorax can automatically hit the target with its bite, and the aurumvorax can't bite another target.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Rend Armor
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target it is grappling with. {@h}The nonmagical armor or shield (aurumvorax's choice) of the target takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty. If its Armor Class drops to 0, the armor or shield is destroyed.

If the target's armor or shield is magical, the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the Armor Class (AC) of the armor or shield (determined randomly) takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty. If its Armor Class drops to 0, the armor or shield is destroyed.

entries: The aurumvorax makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks. If the aurumvorax has a creature grappled, it can use Rend Armor in place of one Claws attack.

Until this grapple ends, the aurumvorax can automatically hit the target with its bite, and the aurumvorax can't bite another target.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage and if the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until this grapple ends, the aurumvorax can automatically hit the target with its bite, and the aurumvorax can't bite another target.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Rend Armor
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target it is grappling with. {@h}The nonmagical armor or shield (aurumvorax's choice) of the target takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty. If its Armor Class drops to 0, the armor or shield is destroyed.

monster.name: Assassin, Legendary
languages: Thieves' cant plus any two languages

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the assassin fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, the assassin has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the assassin scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the assassin is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the assassin instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The assassin deals an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the assassin that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The assassin makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Hide
entries: The assassin performs a {@action Hide} action.

legendary.name: Shift
entries: The assassin moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The assassin makes a melee or ranged weapon attack.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the archmage fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The archmage has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Greater Spell Penetration
entries: When the archmage casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 5 levels higher.

trait.name: Supreme Focus
entries: The archmage has advantage on saving throws it makes to maintain its concentration.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) force damage. If the target is a Large of smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The archmage magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has grappled, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The archmage casts one of the following spells using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks):
footerEntries: *The archmage casts these spells on itself before combat.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The archmage casts {@spell fire bolt} or {@spell sword burst|TCE}.

legendary.name: Quarterstaff
entries: The archmage attacks with its Quarterstaff.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The archmage uses its Teleport action.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The archmage casts {@spell banishment}, {@spell dispel magic}, {@spell lightning bolt}, or {@spell mirror image}, if available.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the archdruid fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Greater Spell Penetration
entries: When the archdruid casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 5 levels higher.

trait.name: Supreme Focus
entries: The archdruid has advantage on saving throws it makes to maintain its concentration.

action.name: Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant (good) or 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison (neutral) or 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic (evil) damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The archdruid magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has grappled, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The archdruid casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks):
footerEntries: *The archdruid casts these spells on itself before combat.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The archdruid casts {@spell poison spray} or {@spell produce flame}.

legendary.name: Scythe
entries: The archdruid attacks with its Scythe.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The archdruid uses its Teleport action.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The archdruid casts {@spell cure wounds}, {@spell dispel magic}, {@spell entangle}, {@spell erupting earth|XGE}, {@spell ice storm}, or {@spell stoneskin}, if available.

monster.name: Anito

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the anito fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The anito has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Plant Camouflage
entries: The anito has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The anito regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn if it is within 120 feet of its grove. If the anito takes fire, necrotic, or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the anito's next turn. The anito's body is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Speak With Beasts And Plants
entries: The anito can communicate with beasts and plants as if they and the anito shared a language.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the anito casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The anito can use its Bewildering Presence. It then makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, grasping weeds and vines sprout underneath the target and restrains it for 1 minute. As an action, the {@condition restrained} creature can make a {@dc 16} Strength check, escaping from the grasping plants on a success. The effect ends if the grasping plants is destroyed. The grasping plants have AC 10, 10 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage and immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage.

action.name: Bewildering Presence
entries: Each creature of the anito's choice that the anito can see within 120 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed}. While {@condition charmed}, the target suffers the effect of the {@spell confusion} spell without making a saving throw. The effect lasts for 1 minute. The anito doesn't need to concentrate on the spell. The {@condition charmed} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the anito's Bewildering Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The anito magically polymorphs into a Mediumsized humanoid. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The anito casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks):

legendaryHeader: The anito gains 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The anito regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The anito moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Slam
entries: The anito makes a Slam attack.

legendary.name: Cast Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The anito uses Spellcasting.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: Le dragon a un avantage sur les tests de Dextérité ({@skill Stealth}) effectués pour se cacher en terrain rocheux.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: À la lumière du soleil, le dragon a un désavantage aux jets d'attaque, ainsi qu'aux tests de sagesse ({@skill Perception}) qui dépendent de la vue.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Le dragon peut utiliser sa Présence effrayante. Il effectue ensuite une attaque de morsure et deux attaques de griffe.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +15 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Psychic Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales psychic energy in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 22} Intelligence saving throw. On failed save, a creature takes 72 ({@damage 16d8}) psychic damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks, and can't take reactions, until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a Tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: Le dragon peut imiter des sons d'animaux et des voix humanoïdes. Une créature qui entend les sons peut reconnaître qu'il s'agit d'imitations en réussissant un test de Sagesse ({@skill Insight}).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Le dragon peut utiliser sa Présence effrayante. Il effectue ensuite une attaque de morsure et deux attaques de griffe.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +14 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) piercing damage and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 22}). Until this grapple ends, the dragon can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the dragon can't attack another target with its tail.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Chaque créature du choix du dragon qui se trouve dans un rayon de 120 pieds autour du dragon et qui est consciente de celui-ci doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde de Sagesse {@dc 16} ou devenir {@condition frightened} pendant 1 minute. Une créature peut répéter le jet de sauvegarde à la fin de chacun de ses tours, mettant fin à l'effet sur elle-même en cas de réussite. Si le jet de sauvegarde d'une créature est réussi ou si l'effet prend fin pour elle, la créature est immunisée contre la présence effrayante du dragon pendant les 24 heures suivantes.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales sticky, corrosive acid in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw. On failed save, a creature takes 49 ({@damage 11d8}) acid damage immediately and 27 ({@damage 6d8}) acid damage at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much of the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.

entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack

entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The dragon can hold its breath for 1 hour or until it uses its Acid Breath.

entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries: {@atk mw} +15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) acid damage.

action.name: Claw

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +15 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales corrosive sand in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 63 ({@damage 14d8}) acid damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded}.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a Tail attack.

legendary.name: Sand Tornado (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon burrows into the ground in a violent circling motion, whipping its tail and spraying sand around it. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. The dragon can then move up to its burrow speed.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: Le dragon a un avantage sur les tests de Dextérité ({@skill Stealth}) effectués pour se cacher en terrain rocheux.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: À la lumière du soleil, le dragon a un désavantage aux jets d'attaque, ainsi qu'aux tests de sagesse ({@skill Perception}) qui dépendent de la vue.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Le dragon peut utiliser sa Présence effrayante. Il effectue ensuite une attaque de morsure et deux attaques de griffe.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +11 pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une cible. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) dégâts tranchants.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Chaque créature du choix du dragon qui se trouve dans un rayon de 120 pieds autour du dragon et qui est consciente de celui-ci doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde de Sagesse {@dc 16} ou devenir {@condition frightened} pendant 1 minute. Une créature peut répéter le jet de sauvegarde à la fin de chacun de ses tours, mettant fin à l'effet sur elle-même en cas de réussite. Si le jet de sauvegarde d'une créature est réussi ou si l'effet prend fin pour elle, la créature est immunisée contre la présence effrayante du dragon pendant les 24 heures suivantes.

action.name: Psychic Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Intelligence saving throw. On failed save, a creature takes 49 ({@damage 11d8}) psychic damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks, and can't take reactions, until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a Tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the illithidragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: L'illithidragon a un avantage sur les jets de sauvegarde contre les sorts et autres effets magiques.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The illithidragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes one Tentacles attack and two Claw attacks. It can use Extract Brain in place of its Tentacles.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage. If the target is Huge or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}) and must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +11 pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une cible. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) dégâts tranchants.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated creature that has a brain grappled by the illithidragon. {@h}The target takes 77 ({@damage 14d10}) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the illithidragon kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the illithidragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the illithidragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the illithidragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Mind Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: The illithidragon magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence saving throw or take 41 ({@damage 8d8 + 5}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The illithidragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}):

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The illithidragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The illithidragon makes a Tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The illithidragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the illithidragon must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The illithidragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

entries: Le dragon a un avantage sur les jets de sauvegarde contre les sorts et autres effets magiques.

entries: {@atk mw} +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Hellfire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales hellfire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw. On failed save, a creature takes 66 ({@damage 12d10}) fire damage and becomes vulnerable to fire damage until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: Le dragon se polymorphe magiquement en un tiefling ou en un démon de taille moyenne. Il peut revenir à sa vraie forme comme une action bonus. Ses statistiques, autres que sa taille, sont les mêmes dans chaque forme. L'équipement qu'il porte n'est pas transformé. Il revient à sa vraie forme s'il meurt.

bonus.name: Heated Body
entries: Le dragon émet du feu de son corps. Une créature qui touche le dragon ou le frappe avec une attaque de mêlée alors qu'elle se trouve à moins de 3 mètres de lui et que le corps chauffé est actif subit 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dégâts de feu. Le corps chauffé reste actif jusqu'à ce que le dragon meure ou qu'il le rejette par une action.

entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Charm

entries: The spectral dragon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: Le dragon peut imiter des sons d'animaux et des voix humanoïdes. Une créature qui entend les sons peut reconnaître qu'il s'agit d'imitations en réussissant un test de Sagesse ({@skill Insight}).

Until this grapple ends, the dragon can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the dragon can't attack another target with its tail.

On a successful save, a creature takes half as much of the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.

On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded}.

entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a Tail attack.
